{{Infobox dungeon |name = Burned Tower |image = [[File:Burned Tower.png]] |caption = An outside view of Burned Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northwest of Ecruteak City. }} '''Burned Tower''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 88,500 |- | Boss || 320,000 |- | Shuckle || 610,000 |}
===Pokémon===
